des: Who is making the Web Standards?

options: HTML handles data, CSS handles routing
HTML tells the broswer what to display, CSS tell it what style to display it in
HTML styles the page, CSS makes it interactive
HTML makes the page interactive, CSS styles the page
answer: HTML tells the broswer what to display, CSS tell it what style to display it in
